unnormalised: IRCTC announces special summer trains to tackle rush! Folks travelling home for the holidays, listen up! Indian Railways, via IRCTC, is running extra trains this summer to ease the peak season craziness. Expect heavy traffic on popular routes like Delhi to Patna & Mumbai to Kolkata.
normalised: I-R-C-T-C announces special summer trains to tackle rush! Folks travelling home for the holidays, listen up! Indian Railways, via I-R-C-T-C, is running extra trains this summer to ease the peak season craziness. Expect heavy traffic on popular routes like Delhi to Patna and Mumbai to Kolkata.

unnormalised: Specifically, they're adding 200+ special trains. For example, train no. 04041 will run from NDLS to BSB starting 15/05/2024, 11:55 PM every Wed and Sat. Ticket prices are a bit hiked up, around ₹2500-₹3000 depending on the class (SL, 3A, 2A).
normalised: Specifically, they are adding two hundred plus special trains. For example, train number zero four zero four one will run from N-D-L-S to B-S-B starting fifteenth May two thousand and twenty four, eleven fifty five P-M every Wednesday and Saturday. Ticket prices are a bit hiked up, around rupee two thousand five hundred to rupee three thousand depending on the class (S-L, three A, two A).

unnormalised: Chief PRO Rajesh Kumar mentioned in a press release today, 09/05/24, that they're aiming to accommodate at least 5 lakh additional passengers. He also urged passengers to book tickets ASAP via the IRCTC app or website. Avoid touts, bhai!
normalised: Chief P-R-O Rajesh Kumar mentioned in a press release today, ninth May two thousand and twenty four, that they are aiming to accommodate at least five lakh additional passengers. He also urged passengers to book tickets A-S-A-P via the I-R-C-T-C app or website. Avoid touts, bhai!

unnormalised: Moreover, they are ensuring extra security measures on stations like CSMT and Howrah. Expect increased RPF presence and baggage checks. Travel safe, and have a happy holiday season! Don't forget to carry valid ID proof (Aadhaar, PAN card etc.).
normalised: Moreover, they are ensuring extra security measures on stations like C-S-M-T and Howrah. Expect increased R-P-F presence and baggage checks. Travel safe, and have a happy holiday season! Do not forget to carry valid I-D proof (Aadhaar, P-A-N card etcetera).

unnormalised: Remember to check the official IRCTC site for updated schedules & availability. Happy journey! #IndianRailways #SummerSpecials #TravelIndia #IRCTC
normalised: Remember to check the official I-R-C-T-C site for updated schedules and availability. Happy journey! hash Indian Railways hash Summer Specials hash Travel India hash I-R-C-T-C
